name: NOTALONE (itch)
description:
You wake up nowhere in the night. Hungry zombies around, but your ol' pal "BOOMSTICK" is with you.

SHOOT 'EM ALL!

Controls ActionControlShootLeft mouse buttonRunWASDLook aroundMouse cursor Installation and running
  • download .zip archive
  •  extract it 
  •  run notalone executable
  • enjoy! 

Or you can install it via quicklisp:

(ql-dist:install-dist "http://bodge.borodust.org/dist/org.borodust.bodge.txt") (ql:quickload :notalone) (notalone:play-game) Requirements
  • OpenGL 3.3+
  • 64-bit (x86_64) Windows, GNU/Linux or macOS
  • x86_64 SBCL or CCL

Sources:

https://github.com/borodust/notalone
